Name Kind Description
STOREY/LEVEL numeric Floor number of the unit.
AREA numeric Land area (square metres).
MFA numeric Built-up / strata floor area.
SALE_YEAR numeric Sale calendar year.
SALE_MONTH numeric Sale month (1-12).
SALE_QUARTER numeric Sale quarter (1-4).
LEASE_PERIOD_YEARS numeric Lease tenure in years.
TENURE categorical Ownership tenure class.
CATEGORY categorical High-level land-use type.
BUILDING TYPE categorical Specific building type.
LOCATION categorical Development / locality label.
SALE TYPE categorical Primary or secondary sale.
TITLE TYPE categorical Title document classification.
